acceptance: A demonstration SYS→HLR→LLR traceability check is executed, and requirement wording correctness is confirmed.
assumptions: Unified requirement identification and revision rules are applied.
conditions: The demo repository is loaded locally; operations are executed through the CookaReq CLI.
notes: Prepared automatically through CLI to demonstrate DO-178 traceability.
rationale: This set demonstrates three-level requirement decomposition in a DO-178 style.
statement: The high-level software shall verify the signing certificate chain and block startup of unsigned updates.
title: HLR-06 Update package validation
